title: Winning 10 then losing 10 rank games
body:
Its norbit again with another piss off note i win 10 games sweet then i lose 10 games and the funny thing is im stuck with trolls who say they have other accounts and just want to intent no reason intended how am i suppose to climb with these kind of people being matched up what can i do to get out of it its like im in elo hell and then im not is it by chance im match with these people or not cause im getting fed up 10 seasons now and still havent fixed the problem 

Norbit1234
